messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hello, yeah.
Hello, how can I help you?
He's going down Central Parkway with my baby.
Okay, where are you at?
I'm getting on Central Parkway now.
Okay, who's going down Central Parkway with your baby?
My husband, he's got a mental problem. He doesn't live with me anymore. He's on drugs.
Okay, where did you last see him?
I saw him when I got home. He snatched my baby.
This is what you're going to have to do: you're going to have to pull over if you want police assistance.
I can't hear you.
You're going to have to pull over if you want to speak with police.
They're not going to go on a high-speed chase. He does not have the right to have my child. He's on drugs.
But he's your husband. You need to explain why he's not capable. Do you have custody of your children?
Yes, I have legal custody. He has mental problems.
Ma'am, you need to pull over for the police to assist you.
I'm pulling over now.
What's your name?
My name is Lynette. I already told them he has mental problems.
Have you already called the police before this?
I called 9-1-1.
Officers are on scene on McMickin waiting for you.
I'm on Central Parkway with the baby.
If you're moving, we can't send police out. We need you to stay in one location.
But I don't even know where he is.
If charges need to be pressed, they will find him. We need evidence to proceed.
He has my baby.
We already have an officer at your house. Can you roll up your window or pull over?
Okay, what are you saying?
We already have an officer on McMickin waiting for you.
We can't keep sending officers all over the place if you keep moving. We need you to be stationary.
Okay, I'm going back to McMickin.
That's all we need. If charges need to be pressed, they'll find him and put a warrant out.
But that's my baby, and he's on drugs.
I understand that you're upset, but we cannot go on a high-speed chase. We need you to stop for the police.
Okay, I'm going back now.
Do you need any other assistance?
No, I'm going back now. Thank you.
You're welcome.
